name: Can Strike
description:
In “Can Strike,” you play as a worker at Fish Co, where the employees have gone on strike to demand better working conditions and fair wages. But the company isn’t backing down - they’ve sent in waves of robots to break up the strike and force the workers back to their jobs.

As a member of the union, you’ve been granted powerful weapons to defend yourself and your fellow workers against the robotic onslaught. Use your skills and strategy to destroy the robots and keep the strike going. The future of your job and livelihood is at stake - will you be able to hold your ground and fight for justice?

With intense action, challenging gameplay, and a gripping storyline, “Can Strike” is an epic battle for survival. Join the fight and defend your rights!
